RequestToFrame - Interface in player
This interface allows classes that handle stuff (like quizzes) to make requests to their container (MainFrame in my case).
resetSuccess() - Method in class util.Deck
Sets all the success counter of all the questions in the deck to 0 If the root element is null, process stops and returns 1.
rewind() - Method in class util.Deck
Makes the root element go back in the prev elements until no such element exists.
root - Variable in class util.Deck
